channel.title: CVE Feed for TianoCore -- edk2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TianoCore -- edk2

item.title: CVE-2023-45229|2024-08-02T20:14:19.771Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when processing the IA_NA or IA_TA option in a DHCPv6 Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-45237|2024-08-02T20:14:19.957Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a predictable TCP Initial Sequence Number. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-45231|2024-08-02T20:14:19.956Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when processingÂ Neighbor Discovery Redirect message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-45235|2024-08-02T20:14:19.859Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description:
EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a buffer overflow vulnerability when
handling Server ID option
from a DHCPv6 proxy Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity and/or Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45233|2024-08-02T20:14:20.140Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an infinite lop vulnerability when parsing a PadN option in the Destination Options header of IPv6. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45232|2024-08-02T20:14:19.743Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an infinite loop vulnerability when parsing unknown options in the Destination Options header of IPv6. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45230|2024-08-02T20:14:19.957Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a buffer overflow vulnerability via a long server ID option in DHCPv6 client. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity and/or Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45236|2024-08-02T20:14:19.966Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a predictable TCP Initial Sequence Number. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-45234|2024-08-02T20:14:19.990Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to a buffer overflow vulnerability when processing DNS Servers option from a DHCPv6 Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity and/or Availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-08-01T18:33:25.573Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-05-30T20:46:21.627Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.
